categories: Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny episodes

nodes.text: Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Volume 1

Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Volume 1 is the first TV special of the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny. It featured eight episodes of the series, four of which were new. The special added segments of narration by Maz Kanata between the episodes. It was released on October 1, 2017.
The special includes the following episodes, and interludes narrated by Maz Kanata.
